articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow live text updates as Manchester United take on PAOK, Tottenham travel to face Galatasaray in the Europa League and Chelsea face NOAH in the Conference League.
articles.title: Europa & Conference League LIVE: Galatasaray vs Tottenham, Man Utd vs PAOK, Chelsea vs NOAH - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: Amad Diallo scores both goals as Manchester United beat Greek side PAOK at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Man Utd beat PAOK to record first Europa League win of season

articles.description: Chelsea record the biggest Europa Conference League victory as they crush Armenian side FC Noah at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Chelsea smash eight goals past Armenian side Noah

articles.description: Victor Osimhen scores twice as Galatasaray inflict a first Europa League defeat of the season against 10-man Tottenham in Istanbul.
articles.title: Galatasaray 3-2 Tottenham Hotspur: Victor Osimhen scores twice in thriller

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Olympiakos Piraeus vs Rangers in the UEFA Europa League
articles.title: Olympiakos Piraeus vs Rangers: UEFA Europa League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Iga Swiatek is knocked out of the WTA Finals after group rival Barbora Krejcikova beat Coco Gauff to secure her place in the semi-finals.
articles.title: WTA Finals 2024: Iga Swiatek out after Barbora Krejcikova beats Coco Gauff

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Hearts vs Heidenheim in the UEFA Conference League
articles.title: Hearts vs Heidenheim: UEFA Conference League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from West Bromwich Albion v Burnley in the Championship.
articles.title: Championship LIVE: West Bromwich Albion v Burnley

articles.description: England hope switching Ollie Lawrence to outside centre against Australia will enable the Bath star to bring his ball-carrying power to the fore on Saturday.
articles.title: England v Australia: Will Ollie Lawrence switch to 13 help Steve Borthwick's attack?

articles.description: Lee Carsley names Taylor Harwood-Bellis and Lewis Hall in his final England squad for this month's Nations League fixtures.
articles.title: England squad: Taylor Harwood-Bellis and Lewis Hall given first call-ups
